ModuleTitle: We the Citizens - Understanding Singapore’s Politics
ModuleDescription:
The module initiates students into the workings of
politics from the perspective of citizenship. What
constitutes citizenship? What are the roles, duties and
obligations of being a Singapore citizen? How do
citizens interact and impact politics and decision
making in Singapore? How have changes over the
years, including (a) perspective of Singapore’s political
history, (b) imperatives shaping national politics, (c) the
political system, (d) its key structures and approaches
to nation building, affected national politics and in turn,
led to the political elites responding to changing
demands of citizens? The role of civic and civil society
will also be discussed.
